https://tmrev.io/movie/503410-Cinemaamor 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i96vGWcy3qo3nS9kRCiXYUEv4Mf.jpg Joaquim is a romantic supermarket employee. He has only one friend Gaspar, who speaks almost only for cinematic quotes. At leisure, go around town looking for the right woman. But when found, she throws herself from a balcony. Then comes a dance, as in a musical, and an obvious surprise... A movie about beauty and glory that has more love stories. Cinemaamor
